overall.description: Compute the (Moore-Penrose) pseudo-inverse of a matrix.

a.description: Matrix or stack of matrices to be pseudo-inverted.

rcond.description: Cutoff for small singular values. Singular values less than or equal to rcond * largest_singular_value are set to zero. Broadcasts against the stack of matrices.

hermitian.description: If True, a is assumed to be Hermitian (symmetric if real-valued), enabling a more efficient method for finding singular values. Defaults to False.  New in version 1.17.0.

B.description: The pseudo-inverse of a. If a is a matrix instance, then so is B.
